text: A Dog of Flanders was written in 1872 by English author Marie Louise de la Ram√©e. It is about a dog named Patrasche who ends up living with an artist named Nello and his grandfather, Jeehan Daas. Several movies and TV series have been made based on this book. Among them are: * A Dog of Flanders (1959 movie) * A Dog of Flanders (1999 movie) Category:1872 books Category:Books about dogs Category:English novels
title: A Dog of Flanders
